This is my project!

Computer Vision

  1. FFT

    Using java to achieve non-recursive FFT, Apply circle filter and butter-flow filter to remove different kinds of noise.

  2. Crowd Counting

    Using matlab to extract crowd features and train a model, Apply the model to predict the density map.

  3. Interested Point

    Detect Harris Corner on two photos contain same object but with different perspective.

  4. Object Tracting

    Tracking objects by matching the interested points in each frame.

Database

  1. Killer Tomato

    Using Oracle Geo package to draw a picture and then translate the SQL command into JAVA code. Display the image in both MapViewer and JAVA widget.

Android Development

Big Data

  1. Hadoop AWS

    intro of Hadoop-AWS

Others

  1. Escape the maze

    Using JAVA to achieve an expert system to help the robot escape the maze.
